ISSUE.TITLE: Support Prompt on Launch for Workflow Job Template
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE Some fields in the Workflow Job Template Form need to support Prompt on Launch functionality. See mock up below. https://tower-mockups.testing.ansible.com/patternfly/templates/templates-workflows-add/ ##### SUMMARY Current ui supports Prompt on Launch for SCM Branch, Inventory, Variables, and Limit related to #4967
